encodingDesc.p: The following text is encoded in accordance with EpiDoc standards and with the CTS/CITE Architecture.

head.title: . Appendix tertii tomi OPERUM S. AUGUSTINI COMPLECTENS ALIQUOT IN SCRIPTURAM TRACTATUS IPSI OLIM FALSO ADSCRIPTOS,

ab.title: DE MIRABILIBUS S. SCRIPTURÆ, LIBROS TRES.
' QUÆSTIONES VETERIS ET NOVI TESTAMENTI, olim in IV tomo exhibitas.
IN APOCALYPSIM JOANNIS EXPOSITIONEM, olim in IX tomo.

div.p:
Alia quaedam opuscula in tertii tomi Appendice antehac contenta, cum ad sacram Scripturam non pertineant, in alios
tomos retulimus, scilicet: de Ecclesiasticis Dogmatibus, de Fide ad Petrum, de Spiritu et Anima, Quaestiunculas de Trini­
late, in VIII tomum; et sententias Prosperi, in IX tomum.
